message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $1350000 for the product. This offer includes a comprehensive service package and ensures a smooth integration into your operations. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require more information.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would allow me to get the most value out of the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I'm glad to present an alternative proposal. Given your interest and the value you see in our product, I am willing to consider a price of $1275000 for the product. This price includes all the features you're looking for, along with some additional services that could further enhance its utility for your business. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your budget and expectations. Please let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for the revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1225000 for the product. I believe this price is a fair compromise, and I'm confident it will work for both of us. Can you consider this offer?
